title: New: Totoake – Beachfire
content:
Totoake creates hazy, loveable bedroom pop via Santa Cruz, California.

His latest track Beachfire certainly channels the vibe of his surroundings with chirpy melodies and surfy production throughout.

Check out Beachfire below and drift off into summer longing… (Especially if you live in dreary, wet Glasgow like me)
